Package source

Class Bill

java.lang.Object
source.Bill
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Bill extends Object implements Serializable
The Bill class represents a bill for a particular item. It stores details such as item ID, count, total price for the items, and the item itself. This class provides methods to get item details, calculate the total price, display the bill, and update the item count.
See Also:
